inclusion.criterion: recovered from acute toxic effects of all prior chemotherapy, immunotherapy, or radiotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: adequate hematologic, hepatic and renal function
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: measurable or evaluable disease as per RECIST v1.1
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: major surgery within 4 weeks of initiation of study medication
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: concurrent anti-neoplastic therapy at the start of study treatment
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is currently experiencing progressive lower extremity weakness and urinary retention. The patient's medical condition makes it undesirable for them to participate in this trial.
